wonk.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: someone who works very hard and is very serious
wonk.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: These are issues that would only interest policy wonks  (=people interested in details of government).
wonk.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: someone who works very hard, is very serious, and knows a lot about a particular subject
wonk.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: He started to become a policy wonk in his new career as a management consultant.
